game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient map from the lost city and bring it back to the village elder.
game.description: The village elder has received a vision that the ancient map is hidden in the lost city. The map is said to contain information on a powerful artifact.

task.description: The journey will be treacherous, but with your bravery and wit, you should be able to reach the city safely.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient map from the lost city temple
task.description: Beware of traps and puzzles that guard the temple. You will need all your wits about you to retrieve the map.
task.location: The Temple of the Moon Goddess

task.objective: Return to the village elder with the ancient map
task.description: A simple task, but one that must be done carefully. The villagers will be counting on you.
